metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8107 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Format string vulnerability in GNU a2ps 4.14 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

a2ps - 1:4.14-1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: a2ps package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.14-1.3').
